2.12. Lab – Summary¶

The Summary page is designed for reviewing the configuation that is about to be deployed. In the event a change is required anywhere in the configuration the pencil icon on the right side can be selected to quickly edit the appropriate section.

2.12.1. Task – Review the Summary page¶

  1. BLAH BLAH BLAH

2.12.2. Task – Deploy the configuration¶

  1. Click Deploy
